Translations.Text: Glor est Unu summoned His servant (Muhammad) nokt Sankt Masjid Mecca) al farthest ej de prostration surroundings ni ben en ord montr him kelk da our sign! Li est Hearer Seer
Similarly ni don Moses scripture rendered gxi beacon Infan Israel ke Vi ne set any idol Lord Mastr Me
Ili est descendants de those ni port Noah; li est appreciative servant
Ni addressed Infan Israel scripture Vi commit gross evil ter twice Vi destin fal into great heights arrogance
When 1 temp ven pas ni send vi servants de ours posed great might ili invad your hejm. This est prophecy ven pas
Afterwards ni don vi turn over them supply vi a lot de wealth infan; ni don vi upper man

Vi work righteousness vi work righteousness your own bon se vi commit evil vi do tial your own detriment. Do when sekund temp ven pas ili defeat vi enter masjid just as ili did 1 temp Ili visx out all gajn vi accomplished
